covid.1: Entry to the event is completely free. During the event on the premises, it is mandatory to comply with the regulations in the tab
covid.3: and follow epidemiological restrictions, e.g. disinfecting hands and wearing masks.

event-info.details: After a short break, one of the best competitions in Poland return to Rzeszów with a bang! This time, in addition to the classic Sumo or LineFollower competitions, we were the first in Poland who prepare a unique category for you - Smash Bots by RoboLAB! Younger participants will surely like the LEGO competitions, but if someone just wants to look and watch - they will definitely not be bored.
event-info.important: Important informations for the constructors of robots in the categories Line Follower, Drag Race, Micromouse and SmashBots by RoboLAB (28.10.2021)

eventsList.name: Exciting competitions
eventsList.description: Participants will be able to compete in as many as 8 categories, i.e. 15 competitions. The organizers prepared the arenas for the struggle on the tracks for LineFollowers or Sumo fights. The track itself in the LF category will test the programming and construction skills of many robotics. In addition to the standard competitions, the organizers have prepared many surprises. Every constructor, regardless of whether he is just starting his adventure with electronics or is already experienced, will surely find something for himself. There will also be competition dedicated to LEGO® fans.

eventsList.name: For the first time in Poland
eventsList.description: This year's edition is back with a bang. Therefore, the organizers would like to invite everyone to take part in a special competition by RoboLab: Smash Bots! Powerful, remotely controlled deadly machines will fight in a dedicated closed arena. Due to the first such event in Poland, the organizers reduced the requirements of the machines to 30x30 (maximum height 2 meters). We encourage all lovers, students and pupils to try their hand and take part in this amazing fight. There will be cash prizes up for the podium.

eventsList.name: The best constructors
eventsList.description: Each edition of ROBO~motion brings together many professionals, enthusiasts and scientists in the field of robotics. It is an amazing opportunity to establish new contacts, meet specialists at work or learn the most valuable secrets of technology from people from all over world. Come, show your best side and guarantee yourself a bright future!

categories.name: Smash Bots by RoboLAB
categories.description: Smash Bots by RoboLAB is certainly the most demanding competition at our competition! In a special arena, remote-controlled robots will fight each other until the end of their breath. There will be a lot going on here!

categories.name: Freestyle
categories.description: In this competition, competitors can put on any project, robot or machine. The structures are assessed by referees and visitors. Each voter completes a questionnaire in which they award points for each project, so it is important that each competitor presents their project in the best possible way.

categories.name: Robot Sprint
categories.description: The sprint robot is a competition in which not only creativity counts, but also the speed of the robot's movement on the board. All robots whose movement resembles walking can take part in this competition. The robot that collects the most points in all rounds will be won.

categories.name: Line Follower
categories.description: The goal of the robot in this competition is to follow the route marked by the black line drawn on the board as quickly as possible. The robot must follow the line as accurately as possible, without avoiding or cutting corners.

categories.name: Micromouse
categories.description: The robot's task is to find the fastest path from the starting field to the area consisting of four fields arranged in a square. The robot must be very accurate so that it does not bounce off the walls.

categories.name: Onion House
categories.description: It is a modified version of the competition known as Ketchup House. We focused on Polish products and flavors, so onions will be the subject of our competition. Because why not? You can come to this competition with independently selected onions.

categories.name: Sumo
categories.description: Robots like SUMO wrestlers must push the opponent out of a specially prepared ring. Many categories will allow you to easily select the appropriate robot class for your preferences and capabilities.

categories.name: LEGO® Tug of War
categories.description: This competition is also brand new! Two robots facing each other will compete in tugging the rope. The winner is the one who manages to pull most of the rope to his side. This competition is only intended for robots made of LEGO® bricks.

rules.title: COOKIES POLICY OF THE ROBOMOTION.COM.PL SITE
rules.description: The following Cookies Policy sets out the rules for saving and accessing data on Users' Devices using the Website for the purpose of providing electronic services by the Website Administrator.

paragrphs.title: Definitions
bodies: Website - a website operating at https://robomotion.com.pl/
External website - website of the Administrator's partners, service providers or recipients

Administrator - Scientific Club of Automation and Robotics 'ROBO', operating at the Rzeszów University of Technology at the address: ul. Wincentego Pola 2, 35-021 Rzeszów, providing electronic services via the Website and storing and gaining access to information in the User's devices
User - a natural person for whom the Administrator provides services electronically via the Website
Device - an electronic device with software through which the User gains access to the Website
Cookies - text data collected in the form of files placed on the User's Device

paragrphs.title: Types of cookies
bodies: Internal cookies - files placed and read from the User's Device by the Website's IT system
External cookies - files uploaded and read from the User's Device by ICT systems of external websites

Session Cookies - files uploaded and read from the User's Device by the Website or External Websites during one session of a given Device. After the session ends, the files are removed from the User's Device

Persistent cookies - files placed and read from the User's Device by the Website or External Services until they are manually deleted. The files are not deleted automatically after the end of the Device session, unless the User's Device configuration is set to the Cookie deletion mode after the end of the Device session

paragrphs.title: Security
bodies: Storage and reading mechanisms - Cookies storage and reading mechanisms do not allow the collection of any personal data or any confidential information from the User's Device. It is practically impossible to transfer viruses, trojans and other worms to the User's Device
Internal cookies - internal cookies used by the Cookie Administrator are safe for Users' Devices
External cookies - the Administrator is not responsible for the security of Cookie files from partners of the Website. The list of partners is provided further in the Cookie Policy

paragrphs.title: The purposes for which cookies are used
bodies: Statistical data - The Administrator and external websites use Cookie files to collect and process statistical data, such as, for example, visit statistics, User Device statistics or user behavior statistics. These data are collected in order to analyze and improve the Website. Cookies are used to adapt the content of the Website to the User's preferences and to optimize the use of the Website. They are also used to create anonymous, aggregated statistics that help to understand how the User uses the Website, which allows improving their structure and content, excluding personal identification of the User.

paragrphs.title: External websites
bodies: The Administrator cooperates with the following external websites that may place Cookie files on User's Devices:
Google Analytics

paragrphs.title: Possibilities of determining the conditions of storage and access on User's Devices by the website and external websites
bodies: The user may at any time independently change the settings for saving, deleting and accessing the data of saved cookies
Information on how to disable cookies in the most popular computer browsers and mobile devices is available at: https://jakwylaczyccookie.pl/
The User may at any time delete any Cookie files saved so far using the User's Device tools through which the User uses the services of the Website

paragrphs.title: Service requirements
bodies: Restricting the saving and access to Cookie files on the User's Device may cause some functions of the Website to malfunction
The Administrator does not bear any responsibility for incorrectly functioning functions of the Website if the User restricts in any way the possibility of saving and reading cookie files

paragrphs.title: Changes to the Cookie Policy
bodies: The Administrator reserves the right to change this Cookie Policy at any time without informing users about it
The changes made to the Cookie Policy will always be published on this page
The introduced changes enter into force on the date of publication of the Cookie Policy

rules.title: ROBO~MOTION WEBSITE PRIVACY POLICY
rules.description: The privacy policy describes the rules for the processing of information about you, including personal data.

paragrphs.title: General information
bodies: This policy applies to the ROBO~motion website (hereinafter: „Application”)
The owner of the application is: the Scientific Circle of Automation and Robotics 'ROBO', operating at the Rzeszów University of Technology at the address: ul. Wincentego Pola 2, 35-021 Rzeszów
Operator's e-mail contact address: kontakt@kneiti.prz.edu.pl
The application uses personal data for the following purposes:
- Presenting the user's profile to other users
- Handling inquiries via the form
- Presentation of the offer or information
- Sending internal correspondence

The application performs the functions of obtaining information about users and their behavior in the following way: by voluntarily entering data in forms, which are then entered into the Operator's systems and by saving cookie files in end devices (so-called  „cookies”)

paragrphs.title: Selected data protection methods used by the Operator
bodies: The places of logging in and entering personal data are protected in the transmission layer (SSL certificate). Thanks to this, personal data and login data entered on the website are encrypted on the user's computer and can be read only on the target server
User passwords are stored in a hashed form. The hash function works one-way - it is not possible to reverse its operation, which is now a modern standard in the field of storing user passwords.
The operator changes his administrative passwords periodically.

paragrphs.title: Hosting
bodies: The application database is hosted (technically maintained) on the operator's server: smarthost.pl

paragrphs.title: Your rights and additional information on how the data is used
bodies: In some situations, the Administrator has the right to transfer your personal data to other recipients, if it is necessary to perform the contract concluded with you or to fulfill the obligations incumbent on the Administrator. This applies to such groups of recipients:
- 1. authorized employees and associates who use the data to achieve the purpose of the application

Your personal data is processed by the Administrator for no longer than it is necessary to perform the related activities specified in separate regulations (e.g. on accounting). With regard to marketing data, the collected data will not be processed for more than 3 years
You have the right to request from the Administrator
- 1.access to personal data concerning you,
- 2. correct them,
- 3. delete,
- 4. processing restrictions,
- 5. and data portability.

You have the right to object to the processing of personal data in order to perform the legitimate interests pursued by the Administrator, including profiling, but the right to object may not be exercised if there are valid legally justified grounds for processing that override your interests, rights and freedoms, in particular establishing, investigating or defending claims
The Administrator's actions may be appealed against to the President of the Personal Data Protection Office, ul. Stawki 2, 00-193 Warsaw
Providing personal data is voluntary, but necessary to operate the Application

In relation to you, actions may be taken consisting in automated decision making, including profiling in order to provide services under the concluded contract and for the purpose of conducting direct marketing by the Administrator
Personal data is not transferred to third countries within the meaning of the provisions on the protection of personal data. This means that we do not transfer them outside the European Union

paragrphs.title: Information in the forms
bodies: The application collects information provided voluntarily by the User, including personal data, if provided

The application can save information about the connection parameters (time stamp, IP address). The data provided in the form are processed for the purpose resulting from the function of a specific form, e.g. to update the data. Each time the context and description of the form clearly indicate what it is for. serves

paragrphs.title: Administrator logs
bodies: Information about the behavior of users in the application may be subject to logging. These data are used to administer the Application and the database

paragrphs.title: Important Marketing Techniques
bodies: The operator uses a solution that automates the operation of the Website in relation to users, e.g. that can send an email to the user after visiting a specific subpage, provided that he has consented to receive commercial correspondence from the Operator

The operator uses statistical analysis of website traffic through Google Analytics (Google Inc. based in the US). The operator does not provide the operator of this service with personal data, but only anonymised information. The service is based on the use of cookies on the User's end device. on the User's preferences collected by the Google advertising network. The User can view and edit the information resulting from cookies using the tool: https://www.google.com/ads/preferences/

rules.title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR THE USE OF THE ROBO~MOTION APP
rules.description: By creating an account in the ROBO~motion application, you accept the following conditions.

paragrphs.title: General information
bodies: The owner of the application and the administrator of personal data is: the Scientific Circle of Automation and Robotics 'ROBO', operating at the Rzeszów University of Technology at the following address: ul. Wincentego Pola 2, 35-021 Rzeszów (hereinafter referred to as the „Application Owner” )

The application was created to conduct the recruitment process for the International Robot Competition ROBO ~ motion, communication with robot builders, presentation of results and promotion of sponsors

paragrphs.title: Privacy policy
bodies: The Application's privacy policy is described in a separate document: Privacy Policy

paragrphs.title: Users
bodies: The application was created for people interested in the ROBO~motion competition, both those taking part in the competition and the audience

paragrphs.title: Content in Apps
bodies: The owner of the application is responsible for the content of the Application. The user has the right to comment on inappropriate content in the application. This can be done by writing to the following address: kontakt@kneiti.prz.edu.pl

paragrphs.title: Disclaimer of Liability
bodies: The owner and authors of the Application are not responsible for using it in any way (in particular, it has no influence on whether or not the entity undertakes any action or action)

rules.title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF INTERNATIONAL COMPETITIONS ROBO~MOTION 2021

paragrphs.title: Definition
bodies: Team – a group of people consisting of Participants and Competitors who independently created at least one Robot or its algorithm, taking part in the Competition.
Constructor – a personor persons taking part in the competition that created the Robot
Organizer – a person supervising and influencing the course of the Competition, having a personal identifier with theword “Organizer”
Robot – a mechatronic device powered by electric energy that moves autonomously and reacts noticeably to changes of environment.
IdenticalRobots – Robots having a similar design and using similaral gorithms. The Main Referee decides whether the Robots are identical.
Referee – a person supervising the course of the competition on the day of the Competition.
Participant – a person who takes active or passive participation in the competition. This could be a Competitor, Referee, Organizer or spectator.
Competitor – see Constructor.

paragrphs.title: General informations
bodies: These regulations define the conditions for participation in the VI International Robot Competition ROBO~motion 2021 (hereinafter called Competition) and the rules of conduct to prevent the spread of the SARS-CoV-2 virus in Poland

VI International Robot Competition ROBO~motion 2021 is the next edition of the Competition organized by „Koło Naukowe Automatyków i Robotyków ROBO” operating at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science of the Rzeszow University of Technology together with its partners. The aim of the event is to popularize robotics among young people and students.

The competition will take place on Sunday, November 28, 2021. The duration depends on the number of submitted robots, therefore the final schedule will be made available on the robomotion.com.pl website no later than 4 days before the competition, i.e. on Wednesday, November 24, 2021
The competition will be held in the building of the Regional Sports and Entertainment Center "Podpromie" located at 10 Podpromie Street, 35-010 Rzeszow
The Organizers will supervise the proper course of the Competition. Each of the Organizers will have a personal identifier.
A necessary condition for joining the Competition is consent to the processing of personal data, including image:
o Persons of age consent to the processing of personal data and personal data in the form of an image sign on the spot - printouts will be ready - the consent form is available at robomotion.com.pl
o Minors are asked to bring a printed consent form signed by the Parent / Legal Guardian on the day of the Tournament - the consent form for a minor is available at robomotion.com.pl

paragrphs.title: Participants
bodies: Adults may take part in the Competition, who consent to the processing of personal data, including their images, and accept the regulations. In the case of minors, written consent of the parent or legal guardian to participate in the Competition is required, consent to the processing of personal data, including image, and acceptance of the regulations - the form is available at robomotion.com.pl
Teams of 1-20 people may register for the Competition
Each team without an adult must come to the competition under the supervision of an adult - a guardian
During registration on the day of the competition, each team member must have an identity document and present it at the request of the Organizer, Referee or Staff.
Registering a team in the Competition on the website robomotion.com.pl is tantamount to accepting the General Regulations of the Competition and the regulations of individual competitions.

Each passive or active participant, starting or not taking part in the Competition, participating in the event, is obliged to comply with all the Competition Regulations and the Regulations in force in the building of the Regional Sports and Entertainment Center "Podpromie". Entering the event area is tantamount to accepting the regulations
Ignorance of any of the Regulations does not exempt the participant from the necessity to comply with them
The organizers undertake not to disclose the telephone number provided during registration to third parties without the consent of the number owner

paragrphs.title: Competitions
bodies: There will be 17 separate competitions. One team can take part in several of them, however the different stages of different competitions can take place at the same time
Competitions that will be held at the event:
Smash Bots by RoboLAB
LEGO Sumo
Nano Sumo
Micro Sumo
Mini Sumo
Sumo
LineFollower Standard
LineFollower Standard LEGO
LineFollower Turbo
LineFollower Standard Enhanced
LineFollower Turbo Enhanced
Drag Race
Cebula House
Micromouse
Robot Sprint
LEGO Tug of War
Freestyle
The exact regulations of each competition can be found on the home page of robomotion.com.pl the link to the regulations is available after selecting the appropriate category
In the case of a small number of teams participating in a given competition, the organizer reserves the right to play only the final phase or to cancel the competition.

paragrphs.title: Organizational matters
bodies: The organizer reserves the right to amend these regulations.
Prizes are awarded on a team basis.
The robot and the program taking part in a given competition must be authored only and exclusively by the members of a given team.
Any questions regarding the regulations should be directed to robo@kneiti.prz.edu.pl

paragrphs.title: Rules of conduct to counteract the spread of SARS-CoV-2 virus in Poland
bodies: Each participant is obliged to cover his mouth and nose only with a protective mask on the premises of the event, the participant himself is obliged to have an appropriate number of protective masks. The organizer reserves the right to ask or refuse to admit a person who does not have a protective mask or an appropriate certificate confirming the inability to wear a protective mask, accepted by the currently applicable legal regulations, to the event area.
The organizer provides an appropriate amount of disinfectants that will be placed throughout the facility.
The number of seats in the audience will be limited, only the unfolded seats (with the backrest raised) may be occupied, while the seats with the backrest down (folded) are excluded from use.
Each participant also undertakes to maintain the required social distance.

The organizer reserves the right to admit to the event area only people fully vaccinated against SARS-CoV-2 in the event that the maximum number of people allowed on the basis of the currently applicable restrictions are present in the hall

The organizers of the event are required to provide the collected personal data to the State Poviat Sanitary Inspector who performs epidemiological supervision in a given area and to the security services at their request.

paragrphs.title: Disputes, liability
bodies: All disputes related to the category described in the regulations of the category are resolved by the judge of the given category.
All disputes and situations not described in the Regulations of the categories are resolved by the Main Judge.
Any disputes and situations not described in these regulations and not related to any category will be settled by the Organizer in accordance with applicable law and safety regulations.

In the event of the Participant's behavior that violates: moral standards, good manners, human dignity, religious feelings or safety of the Participants, the Main Referee or the Organizers have the right to impose a penalty on the Participant in the form of a ban on staying at the event, in which case the punished Participant is obliged to leave the event area immediately.
The decision of the Chief Referee and the Organizer is final.

paragrphs.title: Agreements
bodies: Participation in the competition means consent to the publication of the image (photos from the competition, recordings of the competition and video materials transmitted live using appropriate platforms), basic data about the robot and the team by the Competition Organizers and Partners without the need to inform the Participant about it.

paragrphs.title: Final Provision
bodies: Personal data of the Competition participants will be processed only for the purposes of conducting the Competition, selecting the winners and awarding, issuing, receiving and settling the terms of prizes and distinctions.
The administrator of personal data is Rzeszow University of Technology names of Ignacy Łukasiewicz with its seat at al. Powstańców Warszawy 12, 35-959 Rzeszow

Processing of personal data in connection with participation in the Competition includes the publication of the image, name and surname and result of the participant who won one of the Competition awards. Each of the remaining participants of the Competition will have the opportunity to consent to the disclosure of its result, name and e-mail address to the companies organizing the Competition. Data and detailed results of participants of the Competition who do not give their consent will not be disclosed.

Data processing concerns all participants of the Competition. Participants have the right to access their personal data and to correct them. Providing personal data (name, surname, school or university, e-mail address) is voluntary, but failure to do so prevents participation in the Competition. By joining the Competition, participants consent to the processing of their data for the purpose specified in these Regulations

The competition is organized according to the fair-play principle. In the event of breaking the rules of this idea, e.g. by deliberately damaging another participant's robot, the Competition organizers reserve the right to exclude the entire team of the participant from this and subsequent editions of the ROBO ~ motion International Competition
In matters not covered by the Regulations, the provisions of the Civil Code shall apply

rules.title: INFORMACJA ADMINISTRATORA W ZWIĄZKU Z PRZETWARZANIEM DANYCH OSOBOWYCH

paragrphs.title: Informacje ogólne
bodies: The administrator of personal data is the Ignacy Łukasiewicz University of Technology in Rzeszów al. Powstańców Warszawy 12, 35-959 Rzeszow, (hereinafter referred to as the University), email address: kancelaria@prz.edu.pl
The Data Protection Supervisor at the Rzeszow University of Technology can be contacted by calling 17 865 1775 or by e-mail: iod@prz.edu.pl

The administrator processes your personal data in accordance with the Regulation pursuant to Article 13 (1) (2) of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46 / EC (hereinafter referred to as GDPR).

The Administrator collects and processes the following personal data of the Participant provided via the registration form on the website robomotion.com.pl: name and surname, e-mail address and telephone number.

a) based onconsent to register participants and organize the competition (Article 6 (1) (a) of the GDPR)-providing the above data is voluntary, however, it is necessary for registration and participation in the 6th International ROBO ~ motion 2021 Competition,

b) based on consent consent for marketing and promotional purposes related to the offer of the Partners and the Organizer (Article 6 (1) (a) of the GDPR) - consent is voluntary, it can be withdrawn at any time.

During the VI International ROBO ~ motion 2021 Competition, photo and video sessions will be held, the Administrator and the Organizer's Partners will process the Participant's imagebased on his consentor in the case of minors, on the basis of consent expressed by their legal guardians (Article 6 (1) (a) of the GDPR). Granting consent for image processing is voluntary, but necessary to participate in the VI International ROBO ~ motion 2021 Competition. Consent is available under this link.
Each Participant is entitled to:
a) request access to data and obtain information on their processing
b) rectify data and demand their removal or limitation of processing
c) object to processing
d) withdraw consent to the processing of data at any time - this withdrawal, however, does not affect the compliance of the processing prior to its execution
e) lodging a complaint to the supervisory body regarding the protection of personal data - in Poland to the President of the Office for Personal Data Protection
In order to exercise the above rights, please contact the Organizer.

thank-you.title: Thank you!
thank-you.description: It is thanks to people like you that we are able to create this event. We express great gratitude for your support and commitment. We hope that the sixth edition of the International Robot Competition ROBO~motion was an opportunity for an inspiring exchange of ideas, information and experiences related to robotics and technologies of the future. Thank you for joining the large group of our recipients. It is an honor and motivation for us to continue. We would like to host you during the next edition of our Competition!

details.user-phone-exist: The user already has an assigned phone number.

details.phone-number-exist: This phone number is already assigned to another user.
details.invalid-email: Please enter a valid value for the target mailbox!
details.code-recently-generated: The code was recently generated. Please try to generate a new code later.
details.no-code: The confirmation code has not been generated or has expired.
details.no-message: Such a message does not exist!
details.no-fight: Such a fight does not exist!
details.no-time: Such a time result does not exist!
details.invalid-code: The confirmation code does not match the one entered by the user.
details.new-password: The new password must be different from the previous one.

details.last-category: The only robot category cannot be deleted!
details.too-many-constructors: You cannot add more than 20 constructors!
details.too-many-categories: You cannot add more than 4 robot categories!
details.too-many-lf-categories: You cannot add more than 2 categories in the Line Follower competition!
details.too-many-sumo-categories: You cannot add more than 2 categories in the Sumo competition!

details.time-to-modify-ended-smash: The time to add and modify robots in the SmashBots category is over

statusCodes.404: Not found - the server did not find the resource
statusCodes.405: Illegal method - the method contained in the request is not allowed for the indicated resource
statusCodes.408: End of waiting time for request
statusCodes.410: Disappeared (deleted) - requested resource is no longer available
statusCodes.411: Length required - the server refuses to complete the request due to the lack of a header
statusCodes.412: The precondition cannot be met - the server cannot meet at least one of the query conditions
statusCodes.416: Byte range specified in the query unsupported
statusCodes.421: The request was directed to a server that should not receive it or is unable to answer it
statusCodes.422: The query was worded correctly but could not be continued
statusCodes.423: Attempting to access a resource that is currently locked
statusCodes.424: The request failed because it depends on another request that also failed
statusCodes.425: The server does not want to risk processing a request that may be repeated
statusCodes.426: The server is refusing to execute the request using the current protocol
statusCodes.428: No pre-header that is required by the server
statusCodes.429: User sent too many requests in the given time
statusCodes.431: The server refuses to execute the request because the header field or fields are too large
statusCodes.444: The connection was closed without receiving a response
statusCodes.500: Internal server error - the server encountered unexpected difficulties that prevented the request from being fulfilled
statusCodes.501: Not implemented - the server does not have the functionality required in the query
statusCodes.502: Gateway error - server - acting as gateway or intermediary - received an incorrect response from the parent server
statusCodes.503: Service unavailable - the server is not able to process the query at the moment
statusCodes.504: Gateway timeout - server - acting as gateway or intermediary - did not receive a response from the indicated server within the set time
statusCodes.507: The server is unable to save the data related to the query
statusCodes.508: The server detected an infinite loop while processing a query
statusCodes.510: No HTTP extension needed to service the request
statusCodes.511: Authentication required before accessing the network

cookies.p: Information: The website uses cookies to function properly
